mapper.select: SELECT img_name, pro_name, pro_qna_title, pro_qna_type_name, pro_qna_date, qna_type_name FROM img i, product pro, pro_qna pq, pro_qna_type tc, qna_status qs WHERE pro.no = i.pro_no and pro.no = pq.pro_no and pq.pro_qna_type_code = tc.pro_qna_type_code and qs.qna_status_code = pq.qna_Status_code and pq.no=1;
